node.hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
node.detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，曾到印度探親。與家人於 7 月 12 乘搭國泰港龍航空 KA734 由印度抵港，沒有病徵，由檢疫中心送院。
node.detail_en: The patient has good past health and went to India to visit relatives. He arrived in Hong Kong with family members from India via Cathay Dragon flight KA734 on July 13. He has no symptoms and was transferred to hospital from the quarantine centre.
